name: VirusesCausingEncephalitisTestsForVirusesCausingEncephalitisAntigenInCerebrospinalFluid
title: Viruses [Causing Encephalitis] (Tests for Viruses Causing Encephalitis Antigen in Cerebrospinal Fluid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with Encephalitis-causing Virus in CSF),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Encephalitis-causing Virus in CSF),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
